DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Title : A comparison laparoscopically assist open surgery advance rectal cancer preoperative chemoradiation - randomize prospective trial 2 . Principal investigator : Jae Hwan Oh Co-investigator : Seung Yong Jeong , Sung Bum Kang , Hyo Seong Choi , Seok-Byung Lim 3 . Purpose study : To compare efficacy laparoscopic open resection locally advanced rectal cancer preoperative chemoradiation 4 . Specific aim 1. comparison oncologic outcomes 2. comparison quality life 3. comparison anorectal function 5 . Materials Rectal cancer < 9cm anal verge , measure rigid sigmoidoscopy histologically proven adenocarcinoma locally advance ( T3 ) , determine CT , transrectal ultrasonography , MRI without contraindication general anesthesia , operation chemoradiation Completion preoperative chemoradiation 6 . Statistics 1 . Sample size calculation non-inferiority trial : 340 2 . Disease free survival : Log-rank test , Cox regression analysis 3 . QOL anorectal function : Repeated measure ANCOVA 7 . Methods 1. operation time operation : 6-8 week end preoperative chemoradiation surgical technique standard total mesorectal excision high ligation inferior mesenteric vessel 2. preoperative chemoradiation chemotherapy : 2 cycle 5-FU ( 400 mg/m2/day ) + LV ( 20 mg/m2/day ) IV bolus , 3 day 1st & 5th wks RT Capecitabine 825 mg/m2 p.o . bid RT RT:45 Gy/ 25 fraction pelvis , 5.4 Gy/ 3 fraction boost primary tumor 5.5 wks 3. postoperative chemotherapy 4 cycle 5-FU ( 400 mg/m2/day ) + LV ( 20 mg/m2/day ) IV bolus , 5 day , 4 wks interval 4. oncologic outcomes 1 . Short-term outcomes Surgical length incision op time blood loss intraoperative complication conversion rate Pathological resection margin ( proximal , distal , circumferential ) number harvest lymph node length resect bowel tumor regression grade ( Dworak 's grading ) TNM stag Perioperative recovery duration use parenteral narcotic initiation peristalsis initiation oral intake duration hospital stay 30-day postoperative mortality morbidity 2 . Long-term outcome Primary end point Disease free survival ( 3 year surgery ) Secondary end point Overall survival Local recurrence Distant metastasis Port-site wound site recurrence 5 . Quality life Urinary function Duration urinary catheterization Residual urine volume discharge International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) Male sexual function International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF ) Female sexual function Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) QOL assessment EORTC QLQ C30 EORTC QLQ CR38 6 .
